Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.info = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
try{ set proxy.id = object.%Id() set proxy.idInternal = object.IdInternal set proxy.idExternal = object.IdExternal set proxy.hash = object.Hash set proxy.startDate = object.TDate set proxy.name = object.Name
set proxy.info.isExisted = ##class(Dance.Data.Tournament).IdInternalIdxExists(object.IdInternal) set proxy.info.isRemoved = object.IsRemoved } catch(ex){ set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() }
quit proxy

Method.name: WriteAllForGridToDevice
Method.Description: Write objects to device, page by page for grid.
